name: avenger
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who does harm to or punishes someone who has done something bad, especially to the person’s family and friends: Russell Crowe stars as a grief-stricken avenger on the trail of his family's killers. He went from being her little brother to his sister’s bold avenger after her death. They're both avengers of perceived injustices. See
avenge
More examplesFewer examplesThey were cruel avengers who stripped a suffering land of the last remnants of civility.She was seen as the glorious avenger of her sister's death.If he is a vindictive avenger, he will expose criminal behaviour and punish it no matter what.In his black overcoat, he has the look of an avenger who with a wave of a hand could bring down the wrath of God.
